column1: L, TrustWomen founder speaks Chuck Todd dings GOP Rep WH COS shades Tim Scott FL voter suppression, Egberto Willies, 2021-04-30, Florida is about sign voter suppression into law. TrustWomen founder spends some time with us discussing choice. Chuck Todd embarrasses Texas Congressman. Tim Scott shaded. column10: Twitch My books "It's Worth It: How to Talk To Your Right-Wing Relatives Friends and Neighbors" & “As I See It: Class Warfare: The Only Resort To Right Wing Doom” support  (1)  communication techniques &  (2) Progressive message delivery.
